title: Penalis
desc:
I designed and implemented a lightweight content management workflow so the editorial team can publish quickly and consistently. On the reader side, I built a comments system to enable discussions between writers and readers, including moderation tools and spam mitigation.

 The blog UI focuses on clarity and readability, while the backend and database are structured to keep authoring and comment activity reliable and maintainable over time.
highlights: Custom content management flow for a faster editorial cadence.
Native comments with moderation and anti-spam controls.
Reader-first blog UI (readability, hierarchy, and UX polish).
Backend/database managed for authoring operations and comment integrity.
